title: Fake News Detection System
shortDescription: AI model using NLP to identify misinformation in digital news articles.
longDescription: Developed a robust AI solution leveraging Natural Language Processing (NLP) and Passive Aggressive Classifier to distinguish between real and fake news with high accuracy.

title: Crop Yield Prediction
shortDescription: Predicting agricultural productivity based on environmental factors.
longDescription: A machine learning model that analyzes soil quality, rainfall, and temperature to help farmers estimate harvest yields for better planning.

title: Facial Emotion Recognition
shortDescription: Deep Learning system detecting human emotions from live video feeds.
longDescription: Using Convolutional Neural Networks (CNN), this project identifies expressions like joy, sadness, and anger in real-time through a camera.

title: Smart Home Automation
shortDescription: Control appliances remotely with real-time status and security alerts.
longDescription: An IoT ecosystem built on ESP32 that allows users to control household devices via a mobile app with integrated fire and motion detection.

title: Real-time College ERP
shortDescription: Centralized portal for managing student data, attendance, and results.
longDescription: A scalable web application designed for educational institutions to automate administrative tasks and enhance teacher-student communication.

title: Expense Tracker Pro
shortDescription: Mobile app for personal finance management with visual analytics.
longDescription: A feature-rich Android app helping users track daily expenses, set budgets, and visualize spending patterns through interactive charts.
